name: Orbitary
description:
Have you ever wanted to be a ball and spin around a black hole and survive as long as possible? Yeah, probably not..

In Orbitary, your goal is to survive as long as possible while spinning around the black hole, dodge enemies and collect coins to buy temporary Powerups!

More Enemies, Powerups, Modes and Mobile version are planned, so stay tuned!

(Best played in Windowed Mode, since this is planned to be a Mobile Game.)
